description: Aws Route53 Recovery Readiness Check Schema and API specification.

ResourceSetName.description: The name of the resource set to check.
ResourceSetName.markdownDescription:
The name of the resource set to check.

---

Required: No

Type: string  
Minimum Length: 1  

Maximum Length: 64  

Pattern: [a-zA-Z0-9_]+  

Update requires: No interruption

ReadinessCheckName.description: Name of the ReadinessCheck to create.
ReadinessCheckName.markdownDescription:
Name of the ReadinessCheck to create.

---

Required: No

Type: string  
Minimum Length: 1  

Maximum Length: 64  

Pattern: [a-zA-Z0-9_]+  

Update requires: No interruption

ReadinessCheckArn.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the readiness check.
ReadinessCheckArn.markdownDescription:
The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the readiness check.

---

Required: No

Type: string   

Maximum Length: 256   

Update requires: No interruption

Tags.description: A collection of tags associated with a resource.
Tags.markdownDescription:
A collection of tags associated with a resource.

---

Required: No

Type: array     

Update requires: No interruption
